cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 11th Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 11th Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Basic 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: One bed in a room with 3 bunk beds (3x2). Pillow provided; other bedding and towels can be rented. Electricity, but no water. Kitchen and bathroom facilities in immediate vicinity. Public lounges, some sports facilities, seasonal swimming pool.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic 3 Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Mid-size Caravan for up to 3 people. Double bed and one small divan beds. Included is a fridge, a sink with cold water, kettle, toaster, crockery, cutlery, glassware,Linen  and bedding. provided.No towels. $1.00 Showers in Ablution Block. Communal areas

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
